text: Atahpara yakhana tomara hajera anusthanadi samapta karabe takhana allah‌ke ebhabe smarana karabe yebhabe tomara tomadera pitr purusadera smarana kare thaka, athaba tara ceye'o adhika [1]. Manusera madhye yara bale, ‘he amadera raba! Amaderake duniyate'i dina’. Akherate tara jan'ya kona'o ansa ne'i
